sentence: Share this - Allan Smith 9h ago / 8:32 PM UTC GOP Rep. who voted to impeach Trump shares video of House evacuation Rep. Peter Meijer, R-Mich., posted to Twitter a video he shot from the House gallery as the chamber was being evacuated during the Capitol riot.
title: Jan. 6 Capitol riot: Full anniversary coverage

sentence: Rice also received a $5,000 check from Sen. Lisa Murkowski, the maximum-allowed contributed, and another $2,900 from Rep. Peter Meijer's respective political outfits, a sign that pro-impeachment lawmakers may try to stick together.
author: Brent D. Griffiths
title: Trump endorses primary challenger to GOP Rep. Tom Rice, continuing his effort to rid the party of anyone who supported his impeachment

sentence: It just doesn't seem productive,? Michigan Republican Rep. Peter Meijer told the Washington Examiner.
author: Emily Brooks
title: Republican National Committee censures Liz Cheney and Kinzinger

sentence: Reps. Dan Newhouse (Wash.) and Peter Meijer (Mich.) are two other Republicans who voted for impeachment and look well placed to turn back Trump-backed challengers.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think
